Package net.kuujo.vertigo.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Observable<T extends Observable<T>>
    An observable interface.

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Components
    Component helper methods.
    Config
    Context utilities.
    Configs
    Configuration helper methods.
    CountingCompletionHandler<T>
    A copy of the Vert.x core counting completion handler for handling multiple remote calls asynchronously.
    Factories
    Factory utility.
    RoundRobin<T>
    Round robin iterator.
    Task
    A running task.
    TaskRunner
    Runs handlers sequentially to prevent race conditions in asynchronous coordination.

    Factory
    Annotates an object factory method.
